thread.title: Alaska Communications to Present at the Deutsche Bank 23rd Annual Leveraged Finance Conference September 30
thread.title_full: Alaska Communications to Present at the Deutsche Bank 23rd Annual Leveraged Finance Conference September 30

author: admin
title: Alaska Communications to Present at the Deutsche Bank 23rd Annual Leveraged Finance Conference September 30
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 1:05 PM Companies mentioned in this article: Alaska Communications 
ANCHORAGE, Alaska -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Alaska Communications (NASDAQ:ALSK) today announced that Anand Vadapalli, president and chief executive officer, will present at the Deutsche Bank 23 rd Annual Leveraged Finance Conference Wednesday, Sept. 30, at 4:15 p.m. Mountain Standard Time (3:15 p.m. Alaska Daylight Time). The conference will be held at the Phoenician Hotel in Scottsdale, Arizona. 
A live webcast of the presentation, including a slide presentation, will be accessible from the "Events Calendar" section of the company's website ( www.alsk.com ). The webcast will be archived for a period of 90 days. 
About Alaska Communications 
Alaska Communications (NASDAQ: ALSK) is the leading provider of advanced broadband and IT managed services for businesses and consumers in Alaska. The company operates a highly reliable, advanced statewide data network with the latest technology and the most diverse undersea fiber optic system connecting Alaska to the contiguous U.S. For more information, visit www.alaskacommunications.com or www.alsk.com .
